00006 // Classe permettant de rapidement vérifier des contraintes sur l'affichage d'une page
00007 class PagePermission {
00008     public static $NO_CONSTRAINT=1;
00009     public static $CONSTRAINT_ADMIN_LOGGED=2;
00010     public static $CONSTRAINT_ETUDIANT_LOGGED=3;
00011     public static $CONSTRAINT_ENSEIGNANT_LOGGED=4;
00012     public static $CONSTRAINT_SECRETAIRE_LOGGED=5;
00013     public static $CONSTRAINT_SOMEBODY_LOGGED=6;
00014     
00015     private $_constraint;
00016     
00017     public function __construct($constraint){
00018         assert(in_array($constraint, array(
00019                                                 PagePermission::$NO_CONSTRAINT, 
00020                                                 PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_ADMIN_LOGGED, 
00021                                                 PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_ETUDIANT_LOGGED, 
00022                                                 PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_ENSEIGNANT_LOGGED,
00023                                                 PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_SECRETAIRE_LOGGED,
00024                                                 PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_SOMEBODY_LOGGED)));
00025         $this->_constraint = $constraint;
00026     }
00027     
00028     public static function verifyPagePermission($pp){
00029         assert($pp instanceof PagePermission);
00030         $test = false;
00031         $redirectPage = "";
00032         switch($pp->_constraint){
00033             case PagePermission::$NO_CONSTRAINT:
00034                 $test = true;
00035                 break;
00036             case PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_ADMIN_LOGGED:
00037                 $test = SessionManager::isAdminLogged();
00038                 $redirectPage = $GLOBALS['URL_ROOT_PATH']."/connexionAdmin.php";
00039                 break;
00040             case PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_SECRETAIRE_LOGGED:
00041                 $test = SessionManager::isSecretaireLogged();
00042                 $redirectPage = $GLOBALS['URL_ROOT_PATH']."/connexionSecretaire.php";
00043                 break;
00044             case PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_ETUDIANT_LOGGED:
00045                 $test = SessionManager::isEtudiantLogged();
00046                 $redirectPage = $GLOBALS['URL_ROOT_PATH']."/connexionEtudiant.php";
00047                 break;
00048             case PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_ENSEIGNANT_LOGGED:
00049                 $test = SessionManager::isEnseignantLogged();
00050                 $redirectPage = $GLOBALS['URL_ROOT_PATH']."/connexionEnseignant.php";
00051                 break;
00052             case  PagePermission::$CONSTRAINT_SOMEBODY_LOGGED:
00053                $test = SessionManager::isSomeoneLogged();
00054                if (!$test)
00055                    die(XHTMLBuilder::getText("Vous devez être connecté"));
00056         }
00057         
00058         if(!$test)
00059             header("Location: ".$redirectPage);
00060     }
00061 }
